args: You have GOT to be kidding me!
I can't believe you just said that!\nWhy did I EVER expect anything\nfrom you?!
Um, Curran? Did something happen?\nIt sounded like quite the argument.
Oh, hey there. Sorry for the racket.\nThat bloviating buffoon said something\nthat really got my goat.
The word ＂bloviating＂ can only refer\nto our dear Heinwald.
The two of you have been known to argue,\nbut that seemed more heated than usual.
Do you mind telling us what's going on?

Dunno what good it would do, but...
So, I'm investigating this person who's
bedridden, right? But the more I look
into it, the more I smell a rat.
You think this person is faking?
Yeah, but I don't have any proof—\nso I asked Heinwald if he knew of\nany way I might be able to confirm it.
And he said, ＂Perhaps you should set a\nfew fiends loose in their room.＂
Pssh. That's par for the course for him.

I jokingly asked if he happened to have
some fiends lying around I could use,
and he looked me dead in the eye and
said, ＂I shall prepare them for you.＂

The little mutant said, ＂I have to some
extent worked out the mechanism by
which fiends are produced. Allow me
to demonstrate this to you!＂
If there's one thing we don't need,\nit's MORE fiends!

Right?! I have friends who have lost their
homes or even their LIVES to those things.
I don't even wanna hear that stuff as a
joke—and I don't think he's joking!
Creating fiends... Do you remember\nwhat we heard, Cleo?
The other day, we were in a nearby village\nwhen we heard some rather...unpleasant\nrumors about Heinwald.
They were so scurrilous, I was loath\nto believe them at first.
But apparently someone died suddenly\nin the village recently, and Heinwald\ncame along and...stole the corpse.
Oh, there's more. From that day forth,\nothers who met a similar fate were said\nto have begun roaming the streets at night.

Their appearance was human, but they
were fiends—or so the rumors said.
Naturally, people were terrified these
beings would soon begin to attack.
To a man, everyone we spoke to accused\nHeinwald of being responsible.
I'm sorry, but this is just...\nI'm not sure I can believe this.
Pfffft. What a load of bull.
Er, do you know something about this?
No, this is the first I've heard of it.\nBut while Heinwald is definitely...odd,\nhe'd never do something like that.
But he just talked to you\nabout creating fiends!
Yeah, but that just isn't his style. I mean—
Um, excuse me? I heard there was\na man named Heinwald here?
I was taken with a sudden illness back\nin my village and collapsed in the road.
My heart and breathing actually stopped,\nand everyone thought me dead.

But Heinwald rushed to my side before
they could roll me in the shroud and
restored me to life, so I wanted to
come here today to thank him.
Goodness. Well, yes, he's just in\nthat room over there.
That's your rumor explained right there.
So far as the villagers know, Heinwald\nran off with a corpse and returned with a\nliving woman—or an undead one, I guess.
It's easy to see how the rumor grew\nwings and spread from that point.
But why would someone spread such\nvicious stories when he saved a life?
The more shocking the gossip,\nthe more excited people get.
I'm ashamed I gave that story\nany credence to begin with.
I, too, was considering the possibility.
Look, don't be hard on yourself. I mean,\nthe guy gets up to some shady business.
And yet your faith in him never wavered.

It's not like I didn't think him capable of it.
It's more like... Well, if Heinwald was
creating fiends, he would have made ones
no one would even recognize as fiends.
Exactly! As if I would create something so\nboring as a fiend that LOOKED like a fiend.
Please spare the lecture for the moment.\nI got carried away with you earlier,\nand have come to apologize.
Moreover, I have a plan for your bedridden\ntarget that does not hinge on fiends.\nWould you care to hear it?
Hoo boy. ...Yeah, sure, okay.\nBut this better be good!
Who do you think you are speaking to?\nNow then! To begin...
Heh. When all is said and done,\nthey DO make a rather nice pair.
Like two peas in a pod.\nOr maybe two nuts in a shell.
